bug.author: ingambe
bug.summary: [rllib][tune] HyperOpt transform list in tuple and cause an exception
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
HyperOpt seems to transform the config["input_evaluation"] and convert it to a tuple (rather than a list) and it leads to an exception:
2020-11-27 17:55:26,360 INFO services.py:1106 -- View the Ray dashboard at http://127.0.0.1:8265 Traceback (most recent call last): File "/home/local/IWAS/pierre/PycharmProjects/JSS/JSS/train.py", line 133, in train_func() File "/home/local/IWAS/pierre/PycharmProjects/JSS/JSS/train.py", line 126, in train_func loggers=DEFAULT_LOGGERS) File "/home/local/IWAS/pierre/anaconda3/envs/JSS_Scratch/lib/python3.7/site-packages/ray/tune/tune.py", line 411, in run runner.step() File "/home/local/IWAS/pierre/anaconda3/envs/JSS_Scratch/lib/python3.7/site-packages/ray/tune/trial_runner.py", line 379, in step next_trial = self._get_next_trial() # blocking File "/home/local/IWAS/pierre/anaconda3/envs/JSS_Scratch/lib/python3.7/site-packages/ray/tune/trial_runner.py", line 478, in _get_next_trial self._update_trial_queue(blocking=wait_for_trial) File "/home/local/IWAS/pierre/anaconda3/envs/JSS_Scratch/lib/python3.7/site-packages/ray/tune/trial_runner.py", line 855, in _update_trial_queue trial = self._search_alg.next_trial() File "/home/local/IWAS/pierre/anaconda3/envs/JSS_Scratch/lib/python3.7/site-packages/ray/tune/suggest/search_generator.py", line 114, in next_trial self._experiment.dir_name) File "/home/local/IWAS/pierre/anaconda3/envs/JSS_Scratch/lib/python3.7/site-packages/ray/tune/suggest/search_generator.py", line 144, in create_trial_if_possible trial_id=trial_id) File "/home/local/IWAS/pierre/anaconda3/envs/JSS_Scratch/lib/python3.7/site-packages/ray/tune/config_parser.py", line 198, in create_trial_from_spec **trial_kwargs) File "/home/local/IWAS/pierre/anaconda3/envs/JSS_Scratch/lib/python3.7/site-packages/ray/tune/trial.py", line 215, in init self.config) File "/home/local/IWAS/pierre/anaconda3/envs/JSS_Scratch/lib/python3.7/site-packages/ray/rllib/agents/trainer.py", line 472, in default_resource_request Trainer._validate_config(cf) File "/home/local/IWAS/pierre/anaconda3/envs/JSS_Scratch/lib/python3.7/site-packages/ray/rllib/agents/trainer.py", line 1064, in _validate_config config["input_evaluation"])) ValueError: input_evaluation must be a list of strings, got ('is', 'wis')
To fix this issue, I just convert input_evaluation from tuple to list if it's a tuple (as tuples can be converted into a list in Python without problem). I've open this issue just to link it to my pull request ðŸ˜Š Ray version and other system information (Python version, TensorFlow version, OS): Nighlty ray build Pytorch 1.7.0 Python 3.8.0 Ubuntu 20 <denchmark-h:h3>Reproduction (REQUIRED)</denchmark-h>

analysis = tune.run(PPOTrainer, config=config, stop=stop, search_alg=hyperopt_search, num_samples=1200, checkpoint_freq=10) </denchmark-code>
